testcase.name: Add 5 text notes in the ColorNote Application
testcase.system-out: Given User launches the "ColorNote" Application.............................passed When User allows the "ColorNote" Application to access "photos, media and files".passed And User creates 5 notes in the "ColorNote" Application.....................passed Then User verifies 5 are displayed..........................................passed

testcase.name: Change color of the text notes
testcase.system-out: Given User changes the color of each text in the "ColorNote" Application as "RED, ORANGE, YELLOW, GREEN, BLUE".passed

testcase.name: Print the time of each note
testcase.system-out: Given User got the time of each text in the "ColorNote" Application.........passed

testcase.name: Change the first day of the week
testcase.system-out: Given User tap on the icon to open "Settings"...............................passed When User selects the option "Settings".....................................passed And User scrolls till option "First day of week"............................passed Then User selects the first day of the week as "MONDAY".....................passed

testcase.name: Search for the 3rd text note
testcase.system-out: Given User is on the "Home Page"............................................passed When User searches for the 3 text note in the "ColorNote" Application.......passed Then User verify for "3rd" the text note....................................passed

testcase.name: Deletion of the text notes
testcase.system-out: Given User is navigated to the "Home Page"..................................passed When User deletes the "2nd" text note from the "ColorNote" Application......passed And User again deletes the "4th" text note from the "ColorNote" Application.passed Then User verifies for the deleted text notes...............................passed

testcase.name: Archive a text note
testcase.system-out: Given User visit "Home Page" again..........................................passed When User tap on "1st" note.................................................passed And User tap on "Menu" button to choose option "Archive"....................passed Then User verifies for the archived text note...............................passed
